q1: Does playback speed affect watch time?
a1: For the viewer, higher speeds reduce actual time spent. For the creator, YouTube counts the full video duration regardless of speed.
q2: How does this help with playlists?
a2: Enter a single video duration and the number of videos to calculate total playlist length at various speeds.
q3: What's the fastest YouTube playback speed?
a3: YouTube supports speeds from 0.25x to 2x. At 2x, a 10-minute video takes only 5 minutes to watch.
